channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Pass
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Pass

item.title: CVE-2022-27841|2024-08-03T05:41:09.891Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20pass
item.description: Improper exception handling in Samsung Pass prior to version 3.7.07.5 allows physical attacker to view the screen that is previously running without authentication

item.title: CVE-2022-36851|2024-08-03T10:14:28.867Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20pass
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in Samsung pass prior to version 4.0.03.1 allow physical attackers to access data of Samsung pass on a certain state of an unlocked device.

item.title: CVE-2022-39910|2024-08-03T12:07:42.906Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20pass
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in Samsung Pass prior to version 4.0.06.7 allow physical attackers to access data of Samsung Pass on a certain state of an unlocked device using pop-up view.

item.title: CVE-2022-36876|2024-08-03T10:14:29.060Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20pass
item.description: Improper authorization in UPI payment in Samsung Pass prior to version 4.0.04.10 allows physical attackers to access account list without authentication.

item.title: CVE-2022-39911|2024-08-03T12:07:42.907Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20pass
item.description: Improper check or handling of exceptional conditions vulnerability in Samsung Pass prior to version 4.0.06.1 allows attacker to access Samsung Pass.

item.title: CVE-2022-30730|2024-08-03T06:56:14.043Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20pass
item.description: Improper authorization in Samsung Pass prior to 1.0.00.33 allows physical attackers to acess account list without authentication.

item.title: CVE-2022-39892|2024-08-03T12:07:43.032Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20pass
item.description: Improper access control in Samsung Pass prior to version 4.0.05.1 allows attackers to unauthenticated access via keep open feature.
